response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe will significantly enhance your business operations and bring substantial value to your organization. Given its exceptional quality and capabilities, the product is worth $15,000 to you. After careful consideration, I am offering you this opportunity to acquire it at a special introductory price of $12,000. This offer is exclusive to you and represents an excellent value considering the product's true worth and the benefits it will provide. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to discuss how we can make this valuable asset a part of your business strategy.", "product_price": 12000}
